exact_coordinates.name: exact_coordinates
exact_coordinates.label: Are these the exact coordinates of the nest?
exact_coordinates.helptext: Do the coordinates above represent the actual nest (i.e. within 5 meters of the nest), the observers location, or an estimated nest location made by the observer? Select "not noted" if you are unsure.

current_location.name: current_location
current_location.label: Is this the current location of the nest?
current_location.helptext: If this location represents the actual nest and the nest is already in our database selecting "true" will update the location in the database.

distance.name: distance
distance.label: Distance to Nest
distance.helptext: If this location is an observation location estimate the distance, in meters, to the nest from your location. Leave blank if not noted.

direction.name: direction
direction.label: Direction
direction.helptext: If this location is an observation location estimate the direction to the nest from your location. Leave blank if not noted.
